oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Arthur S. Randolph claim on the State of Tennessee for Civil War damages
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Arthur S. Randolph's claim to be reimbursed for "one bull and one heifer 4 years" that were given "for use of the United States Government" during the just-concluded Civil War. Reimbursement amount is $48.00. The original is in the collections of the Lincoln County Archives.
